bioconda.name: bioconductor-genomeinfodb
bioconda.summary: Utilities for manipulating chromosome names, including modifying them to follow a particular naming style

biotools.summary: Contains data and functions that define and allow translation between different chromosome sequence naming conventions (e.g., "chr1" versus "1"), including a function that attempts to place sequence names in their natural, rather than lexicographic, order.

bioschemas.name: GenomeInfoDb
bioschemas.summary: Contains data and functions that define and allow translation between different chromosome sequence naming conventions (e.g., "chr1" versus "1"), including a function that attempts to place sequence names in their natural, rather than lexicographic, order.
